games.title: Lumiere
games.description:
You play as a spaceman who's oxygen tank runs out as he moves. The player must make their way through infinite space trying to get as many points as possible.

All assets and code were hand made by myself. Lumiere was my first attempt at competing in a game jam solely by myself. The theme of the Game Jam was 'Running Out of Power'.

**Engine:** Unity 5.6.0f3

games.title: Zeroes
games.description:
A top-down, hero vs enemy, top down game in the style of DotA 2. Made from scratch, mostly using Unreal's Paragon assets for models

**Engine:** Unreal Engine 4.22.3

games.title: Project Boss - Dissertation Project
games.description:
My year-long dissertation project for my University Bachelors degree. I created an Artificially Intelligent character, inside Unreal Engine 4.25, that is able to adapt itself to the skill of the player. The character uses machine learning to update costs within the AI's Goal Oriented Action Planning (GOAP) system to determine the best actions to take. More information can be found on the [Github repository](https://github.com/joshlmao/6CS007-ProjectBoss)  

 **Engine**: Unreal Engine 4.25.4

games.title: Quinn's Escape
games.description:
I worked together with a partner to create a design document of a video game that we would create. We designed a 2.5D, mario-like video game in which the player has to defeat enemies to escape from an abandoned shop. The player gains score from finding secret puzzles and killing enemies, and defeating the final boss.  

 **Engine**: Unreal Engine 4.22.3

web.title: NHS Asset Tracker
web.description:
For my level 5 module for collaborative development, we created a web application that allows for assets of any type to be added and tracked, either by manual entry or tracked by an Arduino to broadcast it's location.  

**Technologies:** [React](https://reactjs.org/), [PHP](https://www.php.net/)

web.title: Genify
web.description:
I created a website that allowed users to log in with their [Spotify](https://spotify.com) account to get their current playing track and display the lyrics, gathered from [Genius](https://genius.com).  

**Technologies:** [React](https://reactjs.org/), [Spotify Web API](https://developer.spotify.com/documentation/web-api/)

web.title: foresight
web.description:
Foresight is a web app with the aim of calculating hero and ability damage for the game [DotA 2](https://store.steampowered.com/app/570/). The app allows users to select a hero, their level and their items and will display the resulting ability damage. The data is all loaded from core JSON files that also power the game.

 **Technologies:** [React](https://reactjs.org/)

other.title: Spotify4Unity
other.description:
Spotify4Unity is a plugin which helps you integrate Spotify connectivity into you Unity game/application easily, allowing users to use basic track control functionality to viewing their whole library.

**Technologies:** Unity, [SpotifyAPI-NET](https://github.com/JohnnyCrazy/SpotifyAPI-NET)

other.title: Darkest Dungeon Reddit Bot
other.description:
On the [/r/DarkestDungeon](https://reddit.com/r/darkestdungeon) subreddit, I created a bot that would be able to respond to user's comments that were a pure quote from the unforgettable Narrator, voiced by Wayne June.

**Technologies:** Python, [PRAW](https://github.com/praw-dev/praw)
